string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Dad, could you put on my shoes?
Did you hear about the restaurant on the moon?
Do you get to the Cloud District very often?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: I don\'t think they\'ll fit me.
Oh, what am I saying - of course you don\'t. ^*^%*\&$^#* NAZEEM YOU $*@$#;
